Name: BONERDALE - 2022 Edition
About the game: Bonerdale is a graphic point and click game that features hidden objects, dialogue choices and minigames that help you, the player, explore the beautiful suburban town of Bonerdale. Meet its lovable and sexy residents while you and your friends are trying to find a job and uncover the mystery of the murders that are taking place in the town. The player can explore more than a dozen locations and items to point and click to. Explore the quirks of even more characters to talk to through choose your own adventure text format and minigames to overcome. The development team republishes the game after putting the project on hold due to conflicting schedules and personal drawbacks. Some of the original members are back, and we are looking forward to completing 'Bonerdale'!
